ItemSource.SourceLine: ' complicated try to get around failure to be able to change styles for insertion point
' typing at end of text. this is the simple case
MsgBox "select some text to change style"
' don't support changing style with insertion point elsewhere, for now
' scaling stuff that may be specified elsewhere
'' guides so can see how text alignment worked out
'dim rhs as integer = inX + scaleBy * wrapWidth
dim minDim as integer = min(OutCanvas.Width, OutCanvas.Height)

ItemSource.NoteLine: see the App About note for most explanation
UpdateStats is called automatically when you change font details, resizing or typing
but you need to trigger it manually if you want to see changes from pasting.
The manual trigger via menu or button also calculates the line stats.

Control.PropertyVal: Enter styled text below to render as a sample report.
If not entered, will wrap text at the width of the entry box
